Fires in, around Boston displace 48 residents

their homes this weekend. (Boston Globe)

Nixon aide and Watergate figure dies

Charles Colson, the Nixon aide who went to prison for his role in Watergate and became a Christian evangelical helping inmates, has died at 80. (AP)

Slain Boston University student identified

The Boston university graduate student who was shot to death Thursday has been identified as Kanagala Sesahri Rao, a 24-year-old from India. (Boston Globe)

UN votes to expand its mission in Syria

Amid escalating violence in Syria, the Security Council approved a resolution today expanding the number of cease-fire observers from 30 to 300. (AP)
